Data: Toss Australia have won the toss and they will bowl first.
Bracken to Peterson, 1 run bowls the slower one full and swinging away and Peterson squeezes it just wide of mid-off
Bracken to Gibbs, no run swings it in late and Gibbs taps it softly to Clarke at point
Bracken to Gibbs, no run keeps it full and when Gibbs drives to mid-off Peterson ambles out of his crease and scampers back
Bracken to Gibbs, no run bowls it full on the offstump and he pushes it inside out to cover
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 wide lands it wide down the legside and Gibbs doesn't want to chase it
Bracken to Gibbs, no run lunges onto the stroke a little too early and the ball rolls off his body, Gibbs tells his partner to stay back
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run tip and run, well played and well run by Gibbs after tapping it softly wide of short cover
Harwood to Gibbs, FOUR runs poor start for Harwood and Gibbs obliges a half volley by getting forward and timing it sweetly past the covers, no need to chase that
Harwood to Gibbs, 2 runs he overpitches on the pads this time and Gibbs works it wide of midwicket with little effort, Warner does the chasing

Harwood to Gibbs, 5 runs there's a direct hit but it's overthrows! Gibbs defends inside out to cover and sets off for a risky single, the ball hits the stumps at the striker's end and deflects to the third man fence and there's an appeal for the run out, he's safe
Harwood to Peterson, no run almost a wicket! He swings his bat at a short ball and the ball balloons off the leading edge and falls short of backward point who dives forward in vain
Harwood to Peterson, no run
Harwood to Peterson, no run swings at another short ball and takes his hand off the bat and the ball falls well in front of mid-on this time
Bracken to Gibbs, no run fullish on the pads and worked to the on side
Bracken to Gibbs, 2 runs tries to loft through the line over mid-off but he miscues it and the ball lands short of the fielder who runs backwards, not the best-timed shot
Bracken to Gibbs, no run bowls it shorter and he fails to make proper contact with the bat
Bracken to Gibbs, SIX runs that's outta here! He gives him the charge as Bracken drops it on a good length and clubs it over deep square leg and over the chalets

Bracken to Gibbs, OUT timber! And Bracken has his revenge! He cleverly bowls the slower ball and Gibbs fails to read it as he swings early and misses, the ball clips the top of the off stump and he's got to go
Bracken to de Villiers, no run gets a full delivery yo start off with and he drives off the meat of the bat to cover
Laughlin to Peterson, no run nice start for the debutant, swings it in and it's bang on middle stump, he defends
Laughlin to Peterson, 1 run gives him a lot of width and Peterson has to reach out real far to scoop it down to third man
Laughlin to de Villiers, no run struggles with his line again as he dishes out another wide one and an attempted cut meets the toe of the bat
Laughlin to de Villiers, no run fuller and closer to the stumps and a firm drive finds mid-off
Laughlin to de Villiers, no run tries to break free by giving room but he only manages to chop it down to short cover
Laughlin to de Villiers, 1 wide well Laughlin strays so wide of the offstump that de Villiers cannot reach it

Laughlin to de Villiers, OUT doesn't take too long for Laughlin to strike, not really a wicket-taking ball, it was full and wide and waiting to be hit but de Villiers gets forward and ends up slamming it straight to White at short cover
Harwood to Peterson, 1 run taps it with soft hands and Peterson calls for the run very quickly
Harwood to Duminy, no run bangs in the bouncer and he's happy to duck and let it go
Harwood to Duminy, 1 run punches it softly to mid-off and risks the single and his life as the throw nearly takes his head off at the bowler's end, a desperate dive and he's home
Harwood to Peterson, no run tries to swing him across the line but he finds square leg

Harwood to Peterson, no run goes for a wild pull off a short ball down the leg side but he misses and there's a stifled appeal for a caught behind, funnily enough that wasn't called a wide so it must have brushed something
Harwood to Peterson, 1 run swings him towards midwicket and a misfield allows a single
Laughlin to Peterson, FOUR runs pitches it up outside off and he lofts through the line and clears mid-off
Laughlin to Peterson, 1 run drifts on the body and he clips him down to the on side
Laughlin to Duminy, 2 runs that's a nasty bouncer and he takes his eyes off the ball and the ball clips his arm and clears the keeper
Laughlin to Duminy, 1 run full outside off and pushed just wide of mid-off
Laughlin to Peterson, no run fullish on the pads and he pushes it to short midwicket
Laughlin to Peterson, 1 leg bye swings too early and fails to account for the swing as the ball clips his pads and rolls to the onside
Hopes to Peterson, no run Peterson moves a long way across his stumps to scoop it to fine leg but the execution was poor, fails to make any contact
Hopes to Peterson, 1 run makes room to crash it through the offside but he gets a thick inside edge wide of the stumps
Hopes to Duminy, no run can't quite decide what shot to play and he settles for a gentle dab towards the keeper
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run much better, tip and run to the off side and he gets off strike
Hopes to Peterson, SIX runs that's more like it! He stays at the crease, waits for the short ball to come on to him before pulling fiercely over deep midwicket and deep square
Hopes to Peterson, no run hits a good length outside off and a firm punch finds mid-off
Hussey to Duminy, no run full outside of and pushed straight to mid-off
Hussey to Duminy, 1 run that's a full toss and he pushes it down to mid-on
Hussey to Peterson, SIX runs absolutely nobody under that, he gets on his knee to a flighted delivery and slogs him dead straight over the ropes
Hussey to Peterson, 1 run full outside off and pushed wide of cover
Hussey to Duminy, 1 run fullish on the pads and worked down to mid-on
Hussey to Peterson, 1 run drifts on the pads and he clips it wide of square leg and takes a quick single
Hopes to Peterson, FOUR runs good improvisation there! He gets on his knee, picks up the full delivery on the pads and sweeps him to long leg
Hopes to Peterson, 1 run too wide outside off and he reaches out and the ball flies off the top edge of the bat and races to third man
Hopes to Duminy, no run brilliant save by White at wide mid-off! That saved a couple of runs surely
Hopes to Duminy, no run another excellent save, this time by Clarke at backward point! Two good shots for no runs
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run he clubs a short delivery but mistimes it and the ball just falls short of mid-on
Hopes to Peterson, FOUR runs much better, he gets to the pitch of the ball and slams a full delivery over wide mid-off and extra cover, the timing was good
White to Duminy, 2 runs full toss down the leg side and he clips him down to fine leg
White to Duminy, 1 wide
White to Duminy, 1 run fullish on the pad and he clips it softly to the on side for a single
White to Peterson, 1 run makes room to a short ball and bashes it down to long-on
White to Duminy, no run he waits for the ball to come onto him before softly dabbing it past the keeper
White to Duminy, 1 run drops it a fraction too short and he makes a wee bit of room and chops it hard to the off side
White to Peterson, no run he really fires this one quick and drops it a bit short, Peterson manages to push it back to the bowler
Hopes to Duminy, no run moves across for the paddle scoop but he finds short fine leg
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run bowls the slower one and he makes room but checks his drive, Hopes misfields on the follow through

Hopes to Peterson, OUT Peterson gives himself way too much room and exposes the stumps too much for his liking, Hopes fires it on the blockhole and the ball cannons onto the stumps, the bails are splattered
Hopes to van der Merwe, no run just gets a bit of width and he chops it down to point
Hopes to van der Merwe, 1 run strays on the pads and he clips it on the up to fine leg
Hopes to Duminy, FOUR runs Hopes doesn't bowl to his field there, he sprays it on the pads and Duminy moves across and clips it well wide of short fine leg
Hussey to van der Merwe, 1 run turns it softly in front of deep square leg and thinks of a second run
Hussey to Duminy, 1 run full on the offstump and pushed down the ground to long-off
Hussey to van der Merwe, 1 run gets on his knee and slog sweeps him and the ball falls short of deep square
Hussey to Duminy, 1 run fires it outside off and he squeezes it to the off side
Hussey to van der Merwe, no run
Hussey to van der Merwe, 1 run gets on his knee and tries to smash him straight but the ball travels off the slice of the bat and drops short of long-off
Hopes to van der Merwe, no run jams it on the blockhole and he makes a bit of room and squirts it to backward point
Hopes to van der Merwe, no run he drops it short and takes the pace of the ball, enough to fox the batsman who makes room and swings and misses
Hopes to van der Merwe, 1 run he gets forward and plays a firm cover drive but there's protection in the deep
Hopes to Duminy, no run Duminy fails to pick the slower ball and he fails to put away a legstump half volley
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run takes the pace off the ball and Duminy works it through the line to long-on
Hopes to van der Merwe, no run great stuff from Hopes as he fires it on the blockhole outside off and the batsman swings hard, the ball takes the under edge and lobs to the keeper
Hussey to Duminy, no run pushes it down the pitch but he fails to beat the bowler
Hussey to Duminy, 1 run floats it on leg and he works it down to square leg
Hussey to van der Merwe, no run chops it hard down the pitch back to the bowler
Hussey to van der Merwe, SIX runs steps down the track and he gets enough power and wood behind the ball to clear long-off, it's a mishit in fact
Hussey to van der Merwe, 1 run floated towards leg and he places it wide of mid-off
Hussey to Duminy, 1 run places it down to short fine leg
Harwood to Duminy, 1 run fullish on the pads and he swings across the line and places it to the deep
Harwood to van der Merwe, 2 runs makes a bit of room and swings a full delivery across the line and beats midwicket, a sliding stop saves a boundary, the Australians have fielded really well today
Harwood to van der Merwe, no run drops the length short and van der Merwe swings and misses it completely
Harwood to van der Merwe, no run once again swings way too early at a short delivery outside off, all his swings seem to meet thin air
Harwood to van der Merwe, 1 run bludgeons a full delivery to mid-off and a direct hit by Ponting would have sent van der Merwe packing
Harwood to Duminy, OUT lucky strike for Harwood! He bowls a full toss on the stumps and Duminy moves across his stumps to paddle it away but misses and his leg stump is flattened
Bracken to van der Merwe, SIX runs going going gone! He takes a couple of paces down and swings him straight over his head and the sightscreen
Bracken to van der Merwe, no run makes room to club him down the ground and he swings and misses it completely
Bracken to van der Merwe, SIX runs it's a full toss outside off and he makes room and scoops him high over cover, there must have been about 50 hands over the rope trying to catch that
Bracken to van der Merwe, (no ball)

Bracken to van der Merwe, FOUR runs that's a mishit and it still goes for four! He tries to pull him over the on side but the ball balloons over the off side and finds the boundary at deep backward point
Bracken to van der Merwe, FOUR runs take that! He makes a bit of room and sends a full toss crashing past extra cover, that travelled like a rocket
Bracken to van der Merwe, 2 runs Dropped He swings wildly again and goes for broke and the ball is into orbit for ages, White loses sight of it at mid-off and drops it
Laughlin to Morkel, 1 run full outside off and pushes it to the off side
Laughlin to van der Merwe, 2 runs
Laughlin to van der Merwe, 2 runs makes room and he clubs a low full toss down to deep square leg

Laughlin to van der Merwe, SIX runs he's a lucky bloke as yet another mishit manages to clear the rope! Amazing! He tries to deposit him over deep midwicket but the ball sails over deep point instead, what bat speed
Laughlin to van der Merwe, 1 bye bowls the slower one and he swings wildly and misses, so does Haddin as a fumble allows a bye
Laughlin to Morkel, no run
Harwood to van der Merwe, 1 run that's well bowled, he fires it on the yorker length and he squeezes it down to the off side
Harwood to Morkel, 1 run full on the pads and punched hard down the ground to long-on

Harwood to van der Merwe, OUT he goes for 48, Harwood drops it short and van der Merwe makes room to slice it through the off side, the short length foxes him and he has no room to work with and as a result he gets a faint edge to Haddin
Harwood to Boucher, no run drops it short and he swings and misses
Harwood to Boucher, no run chops it down back to the bowler and tells his partner to stay back
Harwood to Boucher, 1 run jams it on the blockhole and he squirts it down to backward point
Bracken to Boucher, 1 wide comes round the wicket and sprays it spectacularly wide outside off, the ball nearly lands outside the pitch area
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run fullish on the stumps and clubbed away to long-on
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run lands it on a good length and cramps him for room as he tucks it down to square leg
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run low full toss outside off and he only manages a single to long-on
Bracken to Morkel, no run wild swing and a miss, he was beaten for pace and the ball sails just over the top of the stumps
Bracken to Morkel, no run takes the pace off the ball and another swing and a miss, the ball just creeps past the offstump this time
Bracken to Morkel, SIX runs bangs it in short and he swings and boy does he make contact! He just manages to clear Ponting's palm at deep square leg
Laughlin to Boucher, 1 leg bye bangs it in short and Boucher takes his eyes off the ball as he shapes to pull and the ball rolls off the body, Laughlin attempts an athletic under arm flick
Laughlin to Morkel, FOUR runs
Laughlin to Morkel, no run hurries onto him as he shapes to pull and the ball rolls off the splice of the bat to the on side
Laughlin to Morkel, 1 run gives him the charge and he cleverly bowls the slower ball wide of the offstump
Laughlin to Boucher, no run he slogs and misses it completely
Laughlin to Boucher, SIX runs he bowls it on the stumps and gets punished, he makes room and slogs him away, it's more of a flat six which just clears the deep midwicket rope

South Africa will be reasonably happy with this recovery. The innings was shaped on a very chancy innings by van der Merwe which included a series of mishits which somehow found the boundary. Australia bowled a lot slower balls to fox the batsmen and overall it's been a good
The players are out in the middle, and Johann Louw is set to open the proceedings
Louw to Clarke, 1 wide He starts off with a very wide one outside offstump
Louw to Clarke, FOUR runs overpitched this time, Michael Clarke cracks that uppishly through the covers, an acrobatic dive from the fielder doesn't stop the ball from screaming to the boundary
Louw to Clarke, no run much better this time, pitches a touch outside off and comes in to the batsman, left alone by Clarke
Louw to Clarke, no run shortens the length a bit, defended back to the bowler by Clarke
Louw to Clarke, no run good carry through to the keeper, Louw keeps it around off, on a length, Clarke is content to shoulder arms
Louw to Clarke, 2 runs overpitched on middle and leg, Clarke works it away towards midwicket, superb running from the batsmen fetches them a couple
Louw to Clarke, 1 wide attempted slower delivery, ends up as a wide down the legside, not the wisest choice when there no protection at the boundary at fine leg
Louw to Clarke, no run Clarke's given room to free his arms, he mistimes it to cover
Abdulla to Warner, no run fullish on legstump, Warner misses it , big shout but that was sliding down
Abdulla to Warner, 1 wide follows that up with one down the leg side, that's a wide
Abdulla to Warner, no run defended back to the bowler by Warner
Abdulla to Warner, 2 runs quick bouncer from Abdulla, came onto the bat quicker than Warner expected, he mistimes the pull, it swirls in the air but lands safe beyond midwicket
Abdulla to Warner, no run the debutant is really mixing it up here, a a yorker this time, just outside off, Warner is beaten

Abdulla to Warner, no run superb first over from Abdulla, short slower one this time, Warner was totally deceived and was nearly through with his pull before the ball came on to the bat, he nearly drags it back to the stumps
Abdulla to Warner, 1 wide a wide down the leg side from Abdulla
Abdulla to Warner, no run length ball, a touch outside off, Warner pushes it towards cover point
Louw to Clarke, FOUR runs length ball just outside off, Clarke walks into an off drive, not particularly well-timed but it runs away between the bowler and mid-off for four
Louw to Clarke, no run slower ball, with the legcutter's action, kept a touch low, Clarke defends it to the off
Louw to Clarke, 1 run turned with soft hands towards midwicket, the batsmen hurry through for a single
Louw to Warner, FOUR runs angling into the pads, easily glanced away by Warner to the fine-leg boundary, that was a poor delivery from Louw
Louw to Warner, no run much better line from Louw, on offstump, pitches back of a length, Warner defends it watchfully
Louw to Warner, no run overpitched on the pads, Louw was lucky that punch from Warner didn't beat the wide mid-on
Abdulla to Clarke, 1 run full on middle and off, Clarke punches it down the ground, not powerfully enough to beat the mid-off
Abdulla to Warner, SIX runs the crowd gets to see the famous Warner swing, that was a bit short, Warner rocks back and swats that over long-on, just clears the boundary
Abdulla to Warner, no run a little fuller this time, Warner jabs it towards mid-on, decides against the single
Abdulla to Warner, 1 run back of a length, on legstump, Warner gets it away towards midwicket for a single
Abdulla to Clarke, no run slower delivery,122kmph, rolls his fingers across the seam, Clarke glides it towards point
Abdulla to Clarke, no run another slower ball to finsih the over, Clarke doesn't spot it, he lets it through and the ball bounces a couple of times before reaching the keeper
Morkel to Warner, FOUR runs slower delivery from Albie to start, powerfully cut away by Warner, Botha gives chase but a despairing dive isn't enough to get the ball back
Morkel to Warner, 3 runs a bit of width again, Warner slashes it through the off, Peterson gives chase, dives head first near the boundary to stop the ball
Morkel to Clarke, no run played with an angled bat towards backward point, goes too quickly to the bowler to take a single
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run pushed towards mid-off, the batsmen steal a quick single

Morkel to Warner, OUT Morkel gets the breakthrough South Africa needed so badly, Warner is bowled by a full delivery on middle and off, Warner comes down the track and tries to loft it down the ground, misses the ball and his stumps are shattered
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run Ponting lunges forward to drive through the off, gets a thick outside edge which flies through the vacant gully region towards deep third man
Abdulla to Ponting, no run Ponting again feels for the ball outside off, that was 139 kmph, Ponting is beaten by that one

Abdulla to Ponting, OUT Ponting's gone this time, caught behind pushing at a length ball, he was ill at ease in his first two deliveries as well, and this one comes in a fraction after pitching outside off, Ponting took a big stride forward to drive, feathered it throu
Abdulla to Hussey, 1 run Hussey is pushed to the backfoot by Abdulla, dabs it at his feet and sets off for a quick single
Abdulla to Clarke, 2 runs a bit of width for Clarke, he guides that behind point, third man had to run around to cut that one off
Abdulla to Clarke, no run short ball on offstump, Clarke wanted to pull that one, but gets an edge and the ball balloons to the off side, lands safely short of covers
Abdulla to Clarke, 1 run jabbed towards the covers, batsmen scurry through for a single
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run first ball angles across the batsman, takes a thick edge down to third man for a single
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run cut away towards point for a single
Morkel to Clarke, 1 wide wide down the leg side from Albie Morkel
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run back of a length on offstump, tapped towards mid-off, and another quick single is taken
Morkel to Hussey, no run length ball on middle and leg, David Hussey decides to play that off the back foot, he only manages to pat it back to the bowler
Morkel to Hussey, no run test him with the bouncer, Hussey goes for the pull but doesn't make contact
Morkel to Hussey, no run full on middle and leg, Hussey backs away and drives towards extra cover, a loud 'No' from him when Clarke calls for the single as he had struck that pretty firmly
van der Merwe to Clarke, 1 run a touch short, Clarke backed away and pushed it to covers for a single
van der Merwe to Hussey, 1 run Hussey also gets a single in the same region
van der Merwe to Clarke, 3 runs Clarke looks to cut it but gets a fine edge, which runs down towards third man boundary, just kept in by the fielder
van der Merwe to Hussey, FOUR runs ovedrpitched by van der Merwe, Hussey carves that square on the off side for a boundary, not much power behind that shot but it raced to the boundary
van der Merwe to Hussey, 1 run defends towards covers with soft hands, quick single
van der Merwe to Clarke, no run full toss from van der Merwe, outside off, Clarke thrashes it but straight to mid-off, missed out on that one
Botha to Hussey, 1 run clubbed towards long-on for a single
Botha to Clarke, no run Clarke goes for the sweep, it raps his pad and goes through to the keeper, some stifled appeals for a caught behind
Botha to Clarke, no run
Botha to Clarke, no run pushed in quick on middle, Clarke steps down the track but can only push it back to the bowler
Botha to Clarke, no run on legstump, worked to fine leg, but no run as it goes straight to the fielder
Botha to Clarke, 1 run overpitched on middle and leg, driven along the ground to long-on for a single
van der Merwe to Clarke, 2 runs length ball outside off, Clarke backs away to make room for the cut, placement is good enough to fetch him a couple
van der Merwe to Clarke, no run Clarke steps down the ground and away to leg, van der Merwe follows him and Clarke can't get that one away
van der Merwe to Clarke, 1 run this is dabbed towards cover for a single
van der Merwe to Hussey, 1 run Hussey walks across to play that behind square on the leg side
van der Merwe to Clarke, no run punched to mid-on, no run
van der Merwe to Clarke, 1 run Clakre moves away from legstump and crashes the ball towards long-off, doesn't beat the fielder at the boundary

Botha to Ferguson, OUT he's run-out off the first ball, Ferguson shuffled across the stumps to tickle it to fine leg, van der Merwe was quickly onto the ball, he threw the ball to the non-striker's end where Botha breaks the stumps before Ferguson can make his ground,
Botha to Hussey, 1 run clipped to long-on for an easy single
Botha to White, no run turned to midwicket, but no time for a single
Botha to White, no run
Botha to White, 1 run White nudges that from outside off to fine leg, wide enough of the fielder to take a single
Peterson to White, 1 run full on legstump, White whips it to midwicket for a single
Peterson to Hussey, FOUR runs lovely shot from Hussey, length ball outside off, Hussey chips it over the infield for a one-bounce four, he played that one inside-out
Peterson to Hussey, no run this was a touch shorter, White dabs it to backward point
Peterson to Hussey, 1 run turned to square leg for a single
Peterson to White, no run played back to the bowler
Peterson to White, 1 run swept for a single to retain the strike
Botha to White, FOUR runs a paddle sweep from Hussey, fine enough to fetch him a boundary, much-needed runs these
Botha to White, no run the doosra from Botha, a single towards mid-off
Botha to White, FOUR runs lofted over the infield to the long-off boundary
Botha to White, no run yorker on legstump, turned to square leg
Botha to White, no run played back to the bowler
Botha to White, 1 run whipped down to long-on for a single
Peterson to White, 1 run clips it to backward square leg
Peterson to Hussey, 1 run punched down to long-on by Hussey after taking a few steps down the ground
Peterson to White, no run good yorker from Peterson, dug out back to the bowler
Peterson to White, no run defended back to the bowler by White
Peterson to White, SIX runs White shows off his hitting ability, that one goes a long way over the boundary, between long-on and midwicket
Peterson to White, 1 run fired in again, White drives it to long on
van der Merwe to White, 1 run

van der Merwe to Hussey, SIX runs this time Hussey shows us what a clean hitter he is, somehow gets under a full ball from van der Merwe, mishits it, and the ball goes very high but long enough to clear the long-on boundary
van der Merwe to Hussey, FOUR runs hammered past the bowler, the runs are coming in fast for Australia, that one screams down the ground to the boundary
van der Merwe to White, 1 run driven inside out towards mid-off
van der Merwe to Haddin, 1 run fired in full on legstump, nudged towards midwicket, the fielder is onto the ball in a flash, nearly a run-out but the throw is a yard wide of the stumps
Botha to Haddin, 1 run flighted delivery on middle and leg by Botha, turned to midwicket
Botha to White, 1 run full and fast on middle and off, driven to mid-off for an easy single
Botha to Haddin, no run lot of turn for Botha, pitched outside on a length outside off, rapped Haddin on the pads but was spinning away down leg
Botha to Haddin, 1 run clipped to long-on for a single
Botha to White, no run length ball on off, driven firmly back to the bowler, no run again
van der Merwe to Hopes, no run whistling down leg, nudged towards sqaure leg, Botha is onto the ball in a jiffy, and doesn't allow the single
van der Merwe to Hopes, no run Botha has more fielding to do, this time the ball comes straight at him
van der Merwe to Hopes, no run very full on off, Hopes drive firmly to extra cover
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run gets a single this time by whipping it to midwicket
van der Merwe to Haddin, 1 run drops it short when he saw Haddin advancing down the track, it wa on legstump, Haddin gets it away towards long-on
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 leg bye Hopes goes for the sweep to a full ball outside off, doesn't make contact and the ball cannons off the pads towards backward point
Louw to Hopes, (no ball) 1 run caught by Gibbs at midwicket, that was a no-ball though as it was a high full toss outside off
Louw to Haddin, 1 run length ball is driven down to long-on by Haddin
Louw to Hopes, 2 runs another high full toss, but not high enough to be deemed a no-ball, Hopes gets on his knee and swats it to midwicket, Albie has to dive to cut that one off
Louw to Hopes, 2 runs another high full toss, this was pretty close to a no-ball, a heave toward midwicket is mistimes, the edge swirls to safety, falling right in middle of three converging fielders
Louw to Hopes, 2 runs forced to sweeper cover for a couple
Louw to Hopes, 1 run drilled down the ground, Duminy moves swiftly across from long-on to cut it off
Louw to Haddin, no run great ball to end the over, yorker wide outside off, but close enough to be a legitimate delivery, the batsman can't get that one away
Morkel to Hopes, no run clever bowling from Morkel, the batsmen was looking to give himself room, Morkel followed him and sent down a perfect yorker just outside legstump
Morkel to Hopes, 2 runs carted to mid-off for a couple
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run the batsmen charges down the track and lashes it down to long-on again
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run again following the batsman who was backing away, whipped towards square leg
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run a yorker, it is driven to long-off for a single
Morkel to Hopes, SIX runs Hopes provides them with one of those, swats the final ball of the over into the crowd behind midwicket
Louw to Haddin, 1 run overpitched first ball, Haddin carves it toward extra cover, only a single

Louw to Hopes, OUT Hopes is gone, deceived by the slower one, good thinking from Louw, Hopes was coming down the track, he sent in a shorter, slower one, which Hopes mishits to midwicket, Albie takes a diving catch to send Hopes on his way
Louw to Haddin, SIX runs swatted to the long-on boundary, could have been another wicket if Duminy had held on to that, he only manages to push the ball over the boundary
Louw to Haddin, 1 run full from Louw, outside off, swept firmly by Haddin but only for a single
Louw to Haddin, 1 run yorker on middle and leg, worked to the leg side for a single, and that's victory for South Africa
Thanks for your company and e-mails, do join us again for the first one-dayer on Friday
Johan Botha says today's performance from a new-look side will give the selectors a bit of a headache ahead of the World Twenty20.
At the presentation ceremony, Ponting says he's happy with the way the bowlers performed, but not with the batting.

South Africa sweep the series 2-0 with this win. Australia were in control today in the first half of the match, and when Clarke and Warner gave them a brisk start. It was the South African spinners who transformed the game. Only 16 runs come in one four-over spell starting
South Africa won by 17 runs
Player of the match is Roelof van der Merwe, SA
